message.body: Hi fish! I have great news. Ingrid is pregnant. I'm very excited to be an aunt. I don't know what I'm doing so I'm texting you out of excitement! Any advice what do I do? Drink scotch?
Wow! How far is she? No way, drink rye!
she’s 2.5 months!!!!!!!! I don’t have rye. I’m so excited i can’t sit still
Wow, what a lucky baby! Congratulations on being an aunt!
Fish!!! I miss you!! I hope you are well. Maybe we can see each other soon............ Mwah!!!
Also if Sheryl wants to direct me in the direction of good pregnancy reads id welcome Any and all advice. I'd like to send Ingrid a book about pregnabcy!
